    • searchIndex

      public int searchIndex(String term)
      This Java function searches for a specific term in an array of statements and returns the index where the term is found, or -1 if the term is not found.
      Parameters:
      term - The `searchIndex` method you provided is used to search for a specific term within an array of statements. It iterates through the array and compares each term with the input term until a match is found. If a match is found, it returns the index of that term in the array. If
      Returns:
      The searchIndex method is returning the index of the term in the statements array if it is found, otherwise it returns -1.
